name: Playful Chunks - Bara Bara's Secret Shop
description:
In a distant place of the Metaverse, there's a distinct shopkeeper called "Bara-Bara" that sells unique items in his Secret Shop, also known by locals as "Taguara". 

Bara is a businessman, or shall we say... a business capybara(?). It's rumored that he made a deal with some crazy scientist to sell unique toys, games, and collectibles in his shop. 

☆ How to Play: ☆

1. Tap (or Click) to start the game and advance in the dialogues. 

2. Tap over any item to view its description.

3. HAVE FUN ! ʕ·ᴥ·ʔ

✧ This is a fully interactive microgame best experienced on desktop platforms.

✧ Concept, Game Development, Art and Sound/Voice Acting by @Joclpacheb. BGM by TeknoAXE.

✧ This playable collectible is also part of the first Expo of the "La Tokenia-NFTaguara" community. 

✧ Playful Chunks © characters, games, stories and concepts are creative works of @Joclpacheb .

✧ Follow the project at @PlayfulChunks on Twitter.
